name: interviewplanner
description: Ghost theme for the InterviewPlanner blog

scripts.bundle: rm -rf theme/node_modules && yarn --production && zip -r interviewplanner-$(cat package.json | grep '"version"' | cut -d '"' -f4).zip theme
scripts.release:major: yarn version --major && git push origin --tags && npm run setup:package
scripts.release:minor: yarn version --minor && git push origin --tags && npm run setup:package
scripts.release:patch: yarn version --patch && git push origin --tags && npm run setup:package
scripts.setup: yarn setup:ghost && yarn setup:link && yarn setup:package
